author: Staff Reporter
text:
The district administration and the district employment office (DEO) will jointly conduct a mega private job mela on the campus of NPR College of Engineering and Technology in Natham on February 27. More than 250 companies in the State have planned to recruit 9,000 personnel, according to Collector T.N. Hariharan.

In a press release issued here on Wednesday, he said that candidates who had qualifications ranging from SSLC to degree and diploma were eligible to take part.

Application forms could be had from the district employment office and also at the venue.

Registration of names could be done at the DEO office or in the mela. All candidates should register their names before taking part in the selection process. The job mela would be held between 8 a.m. and 5 p.m.

State Transport Corporation would operate special buses to the college from different parts of the district.
title: Job fair in Dindigul
